titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to issue a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the fisheries and coastwise trade for the vessel MONTAGUE.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary: 3/1/2005--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to issue a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the fisheries and coastwise trade for the vessel MONTAGUE (United States official number 1158063).
